name: OPEN ARMS MAXIMUM
description:
This is a vertical scrolling shmup made with the game creation software "SHMUP Creator". It features a simple game system and an extreme, speedy play feel.

But, the difficulty level is very higher.

Control(Can be changed in game.)

Move Arrows/L-stick/POV

Shot Z key/A button

Slow move C key/X button

v1.01 text fix
